#include <iostream>

using namespace std;

int main()
{
    int n,m;
    cin >> n >> m;
    int a[n][m];
    for (int i = 0; i < n; i++) {
        for (int j = 0; j < m; j++)
            cin >> a[i][j];
    }
    int q;
    cin >> q;
    for (int i = 0; i < q; i++) {
        int p,q,r,s;
        cin >> p >> q >> r >> s;
        int sum = 0;
        for (int j = p-1; j < r; j++) {
            for (int k = q-1; k < s; k++)
                sum += a[j][k];
        }
        cout << sum << endl;
    }
    return 0;
}
